name: Gaius Cassius Longinus
description: Gaius Cassius Longinus, along with his friend Marcus Iunius Brutus, is considered the mastermind behind the conspiracy against Iulius Caesar. They frowned upon Caesar's efforts to unite all power in one hand. Cassius, who was known for his charm and persuasiveness, convinced Brutus to rebel. They assassinated Caesar on the Ides of March.
